name: Wakfu
description: Wakfu is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. Players interpret the twelve world adventure by role-playing form with humorous style, exciting plots and very strategic tactics. Plants and animals in Wakfu ecosystem is not different from the real world. Players completely control and influence the survival and destruction.

en_US.description: Wakfu is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. Players interpret the twelve world adventure by role-playing form with humorous style, exciting plots and very strategic tactics. Plants and animals in Wakfu ecosystem is not different from the real world. Players completely control and influence the survival and destruction.
en_US.name: Wakfu

zh_CN.description: 沃土是一款大型的多人在线角色扮演游戏，玩家通过角色扮演的形式来演绎十二世界的冒险之旅。游戏风格诙谐幽默，故事情节紧张刺激，战术也极具策略性。沃土生态系统中的动植物与现实世界无异，它们的生存和毁灭完全受玩家控制和影响。
zh_CN.name: 沃土
